title: Cracking the Coding Interview
description: The definitive guide to technical interview preparation. Learn data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving strategies used by top tech companies.

title: LeetCode DSA Guide
description: Systematic approach to mastering data structures and algorithms through LeetCode problems. Covers patterns and strategies for efficient problem solving.
steps: Focus on one pattern at a time
Move to Medium problems after comfort

title: System Design Interview Guide
description: Complete guide to acing system design interviews. Learn to design scalable systems like URL shorteners, social media feeds, and distributed caches.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: Essential reading for software developers. Covers best practices, code quality, debugging, and career development strategies.

title: Resume Building for Tech Roles
description: Create ATS-friendly resumes that get noticed by recruiters. Learn what to include, how to format, and common mistakes to avoid.
steps: Proofread for grammar and spelling errors
